clues.clue: Remember that subjects can be implicit in Japanese
Objects are marked with a particle
Verbs always come at the end

evaluation.feedback: Good use of を particle! The subject 私は is optional here.
evaluation.additional_clue: In casual speech, many Japanese speakers would omit 私は
